website_summaries.verdict: Superior comfort and style makes them easy to love. Slippers receive high praise for their supportive sole and insulation. We recommend ordering at least one size larger than usual.
pros: Wide variety of color options available

website_summaries.verdict: With Ugg's renowned quality and comfort in a classic, attractive style, the Ascot has earned the reputation as a favorite men's slipper by the popular brand.
pros: This moccasin-style slipper earns rave reviews from consumers who love the warm, comfortable fit and grippy rubber soles
Good looking, with numerous color options to choose from
cons: Like many Ugg styles, these run small — as much as 1 to 2 sizes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Christmas gift, and by the first week of January (so two weeks of wear), the “tongue” part of the slipper had torn. I contacted the seller and was immediately issued a new pair. However, it’s been 6 weeks since receiving the new pair, and they have TORN AGAIN! My husband is 5’ 8” and 170, so...pretty average I’d assume. He only wears them indoors, so there is no reason that we should have had this issue. He’s owned several pairs of Ugg slippers in the past and has never had this problem. We will definitely be buying straight from Ugg in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and wear great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for both of my sons and they love them. They are pretty hard on shoes so I'm super impressed with how these are holding up. They usually get holes in traditional slippers around the toe area, but not with these. They wear them everywhere! They both said they really love their UGG slippers! Best money I ever spent for slippers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dune Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers! Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought this pair for my brother and boyfriend for Christmas and they both wear them daily and love them! Every time they put them on they think of me... And comment on how comfortable they are. Very much worth the price! Always spray with protectant before wearing, however. Every 6-9 months I buy them new inserts/insoles and they make the slippers feel just as fluffy on the inside as when they were new!
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoLucky

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for around the house or quick jaunt to store
customer_reviews.author: Rooser

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for the best slipper I could find. Reviews said this was it. They were right. Great fit. Good online sizing tool to determine best fit. So well made. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Webbster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but run small
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend - he normally wears a 12.5 so I got him a 13 just to be safe. His toes totally touched the front of the slipper and were not comfy, so we had to exchange for a 14. He has never worn a 14 ever, so these seem to run small. He loves them now though!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and cozy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. After one year of use they are still in great shape.Warm and cozy feet all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: My 4 sons

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable durable and slippers I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I bought the first years ago. I still have them, I just use each pair at a difference place. They are expensive but worth 4 pairs of lesser value. The originals are still comfortable, as, of course, are these--just throw them in the washing machine on delicate, then dry them on delicate and they clean up easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Koes

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the UGGS name
customer_reviews.text: These slippers look great and feel better on my poor tired dogs. My third pair and the black suede look the best. All feel good and fit true to a description
customer_reviews.author: william douglas

customer_reviews.title: ... I would give it 10 stars they are so comfortable and look great after a
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give it 10 stars they are so comfortable and look great after a year
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Dey

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a size up and then PERFECTO!!
customer_reviews.text: I knew from reviews to order size up. My man wears 13 but got 14 an it is indeed perfect. He called them, " the perfect gift "!! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Katey C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the UGG slippers
customer_reviews.text: Love the UGG slippers. Super comfortable and well made. I go through slippers, but these seem to last longer than average.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for my husband's cold feet
customer_reviews.text: It is what we expected--his previous Ugg slippers had stretched too wide and the linig had bunched up on both feet--these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: noir buff

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for worn out pair...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement pair for a previous pair I wore out. They are great, and I look forward to several years of wearing these before wearing them out.
customer_reviews.author: WCB

customer_reviews.title: Material is excellent but sized too small
customer_reviews.text: Material is excellent but sized too small. I am a size 10 and I had to get a size 15 for it to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheltie Lovers

customer_reviews.title: Really like these. High quality and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. High quality and fit great. Purchased for wearing around the house on the wood floors and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: these are very narrow and run small - my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: these are very narrow and run small - my husband is a size 12 - i ended up having to get him a size 14
customer_reviews.author: sgmabmpgm

customer_reviews.title: Great Slipper
customer_reviews.text: Best slipper I ever owned. The fit is snug but confortable. The lining is soft and warm but it doesn't make my feet sweat lije some slippers do. They look great and are good for short trips to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Carter

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Already exchanges one pair for a size 14 which I’ve never worn in my life (usually wear a 12) and they are still way too small
customer_reviews.author: ian Maher

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Dad. The 10 was too small so we ordered the 11. It was too small as well. Seems like a great slipper but pretty narrow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gray

customer_reviews.title: Fit is very small
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the slippers is great; however, the size (13) is significantly smaller than a pair of UGG slippers we'd purchased previously. Will definitely have to exchange for a larger size or different style.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with them and says how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size up from my husband's size and they fit perfectly. He is very happy with them and says how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. They are warm and soft inside. Very comfortable to walk in for him. ordered size 16, but they run a little small so exchanged for the 17.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: This was entirely MY fault. I ordered these slippers ...
customer_reviews.text: This was entirely MY fault. I ordered these slippers and wrote down the wrong size.... I re-ordered exactly same slippers but one size larger and wider. My husband loves them !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. As a lot of people say, go a size larger than normal. They are snug. He loves the feel, the warmth. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: He was in love with these from the minute he put them on! He is a hard sell for house shoes because he wears a size 14 and we can never find them. We ordered a 14 in these and had to send them back for a 15. The wool inside is very thick (But super warm and cozy) it will take up about an extra shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Vann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and we'll made. The shoes does seem to run a bit small, so ordered a size larger and it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these from me for Christmas. He absolutely loves these slippers !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: I needed to go with a 14 in these slippers and they are great.
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 13 but tend to be on the larger side of that. I needed to go with a 14 in these slippers and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Cutter

customer_reviews.title: and it fits me just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried them physically in a store, and found the shoes were smaller. So I bought a one size bigger, and it fits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jiaxi Xing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as a xmas gift! He said he loves them and are very comfortable👍😉!
customer_reviews.author: kimber

customer_reviews.title: returning
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He thought they looked "cheap" and they did not fit him. He wears a size 13 W, I was hoping these would fit but they did not. Easy return, so I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Memere 2012

customer_reviews.title: ... his "indoor Nikes" because I thought they'd be more comfortable. I was right
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to wear around the house instead of his "indoor Nikes" because I thought they'd be more comfortable. I was right. He LOVES them! This is a man who "doesn't wear slippers". I did buy a size larger so he can wear them with socks (someone else suggested that and they were correct). I wish I wore the same size as him because I would steal them!
customer_reviews.author: theteach87

product_meta.title: UGG Men's Ascot Slipper
product_meta.description: Our best-selling men’s style, the ascot is a perennial favorite. luxurious wool and water-resistant suede compose this slipper, which has been equipped with a molded rubber outsole suited for indoor and outdoor wear.Draw a straight line, longer than your foot, on a piece of paper. Place the paper on a flat surface. Stand on the line with your heel and longest toe centered on the line. If measuring a child's foot, it may be easier to hold the paper up to their foot. Place a mark on the line at the tip of the longest toe and at the back of the heel. Repeat steps for the other foot. Measure the distance between the marks. Taking the larger of the two measurements, use the conversion chart to find your correct shoe size. Moc-toe construction
